description: This is the second machine in the Den`an series, which together with the Den`an Zon makes up the bulk of the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard] mobile suit forces. The Den`an Gei is a fighter type which uses its superior mobility to perform high-speed hit and run attacks. Unlike most http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard] mobile suits, which are equipped with shot lancers for close-range combat, the Den`an Gei is armed with a traditional beam rifle and a shoulder-mounted grenade rack.
name: Den`an Gei
